name: Vincent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wow, a great hotel from having valet parking when we arrived, swift and very friendly check in and amazing room with most comfortable bed. We visited the spa which was again outstanding as was the food in the restaurant. All 4* hotels should be like this and it made our weekend. We were there for a wedding but worth a special trip to experience the Vincent!
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel from start to finish

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for a friend's wedding recently. Greeted well on arrival and our car whisked away for valet parking (not cheap but not much more than 24 hours in an NCP and saves the hassle). We had a standard room, at the back of the hotel - views not great but room was excellent. Modern, clean lines with high-end fittings including Nespresso type coffee-maker. There was another wedding on the day we arrived and when we got back from dinner a band was in full swing which we could hear from across the street as we approached the hotel which worried us. However, once in our room all was silent! Great soundproofing! A wonderful night's sleep in a huge bed with crisp white linen - just what you want. Breakfasts are great too - our rate included full buffet style brekkie which was all fresh and hot. Staff were all very friendly and attentive. The actual wedding reception was great too - all very well run. There is a gym but we didn't use it so cannot comment on that. A great place for a weekend stay.
reviews.title: Chic and friendly

reviews.text: Recently visited this lovely boutique hotel for a friends birthday, staff friendly helpful . Hotel set right in the centre of southport , rooms lovely very modern, comfy bed lots of extras such as Coffee maker , white company toiletries . Small exclusive bar / night club nice wine good atmosphere Had breakfast in morning lovely, lots of choice very friendly and helpful staff. Would stay again
reviews.title: Chic boutique hotel with lovely staff

reviews.text: Not worth the money in my opinion. The Ramada is much better.
reviews.title: Average

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best thing about this hotel is that it is right in the middle of Southport. Plenty of pay and display on road parking within a short walk away.
reviews.title: Fantastic day

reviews.text: We had our office Christmas party here and went for a meal in the restaurant, followed by a few drinks the bar area. The bar area was full of pretentious people desperate to impress - there were plenty of girls in there who definitely were NOT 18! If you can bear to wait half an hour to be served whilst the bar staff flirt unabashedly with 16 year olds in hairpieces then this is the place for you. When we complained to the manager that we our group still hadn't been served after half an hour he gave us a free drink but seemed too frightened, or incapable, of reprimanding the staff. Nice food but the customer service totally ruined the evening. Our law firm will not be booking again and we will be warning others firms to do the same!
reviews.title: Appalling customer service

reviews.text: We stayed here on a Spa Break with afternoon tea, which was a great price and enjoyed by the four of us who went.
reviews.title: Relaxing trip away

reviews.text: The hotel in general was lovely and clean, rooms nicely decorated although we did all struggle to apply make-up due to the mirror not having any natural light near it and also being tinted.
reviews.title: Simply Amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We all enjoyed our spa treatments and the girls were really lovely and chatty who did these.
reviews.title: Wedding - 20/04/13

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After the treatments we had afternoon tea, which was great until we were stopped on our exit and handed a bill of nearly £73.00. We had to explain we were on a package which they should have been aware of as a table for us had been reserved and it was a little embarrassing when they staff think you are doing a "runner".
reviews.title: little response to complaint

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As others have mentioned, this is the sort of hotel you'd expect to find in a major international city rather than Southport. The decor is very smart and modern and the room was spacious with a large and very comfy double bed. Couldn't fault the rooms or the friendliness of all the staff we met. We also ate a late lunch/early dinner in the hotel restaurant and found the food to be really excellent
reviews.title: Cosmopolitan city hotel in Southport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a great hotel!
reviews.title: This felt more like New York than Southport!

reviews.text: It felt like it was modelled on a New York Boutique Hotel. The bar was busy and lively and the restaurant was light and airy for breakfast. We didn't have dinner there as there is a great restaurant round the corner called The Warehouse.
reviews.title: Sad reason, great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The suite was what all good hotels should have.
reviews.title: Really cool hotel

reviews.text: The staff were all really friendly & helpful.
reviews.title: Excellent modern boutique hotel

reviews.text: Really really really surprised....wow stayed 3 nights. On arrival the staff especially Dave, so friendly home from home...but you are not in a home. You are in a snazzy stylish hotel. I heard the owner is keen to keep things up to date, well he or she does a great job as it feels brand new. The bar is great, we had cocktails but ended up returning later and the music was fab... no duff duff...great soul. The breakfasts could be better in that the sausages are mushy and the scrambled eggs mushy too. Rooms really stylish and equipped with everything a 5* offers. Room service really quick and you can order anything off the main menu. We went to the ABBA tribute night, what a laugh... great fun. Go and you will be surprised!
reviews.title: Great Boutique Hotel with modern stylish touches

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Looks really good on the web, some good plaudits too. Not for me again I am sad to say. Free wifi well it is free because it did not work. Buffet breakfast included we were charged for it fortunately we had paper work to say it is included. £15.00 parking charge, not impressed. Very loud middle aged "pissheads" in the bar on some golf club jolly, all very over the top and out of date code. Moreover they continued the raucous wailing throughout breakfast. Not the kind of behaviour seen in the Home Counties I can assure you.
reviews.title: Misgivings

reviews.text: Great bed, superb shower and facilitties, quality hot drinks equipment, great staff apart from the fearsome receptionist with whom I questioned the breakfast charge, you would not argue with her; she is a one off and ready to use force. Just be careful rooms tiny but for one night acceptable.
reviews.title: Funeral wake

reviews.text: My family and I held the funeral wake for my father here I cannot express my thanks enough for the way in which the staff organised everything for us. At this very sad time they were able to provide a beautiful atmosphere and food.
reviews.title: Hotel stay for 5 Golfers

reviews.text: The staff that were on hand to help with anything were unobtrusive and nothing was too much trouble. Thank you so much to all at the Vincent Hotel in Southport who made this day all the more bearable with your kindness and understanding of our grief you are to be commended.
reviews.title: A good find

description: Welcome to The Vincent Hotel The Vincent Hotel, Southport is a unique lifestyle hotel for the North West of England. Situated on Lord Street, Southport’s Parisienne Boulevard, the Vincent takes comfort and personal service to new heights – all within a fresh, stylish and contemporary interior. We look forward to taking care of you.
